summary.span: 可讓您將舊版 程式碼分成不同的方法以供重複使用，並讓您完整控制擲回的例外狀況和引數。

span.span: Enables the factoring of legacy code into separate methods for reuse, and provides full control over thrown exceptions and arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您的程式碼會使用明確`if-then-throw`驗證參數的程式碼，您可能採用的執行檢查，而且在失敗時，擲回特定的例外狀況協助程式方法，在下列範例所示。If your code uses explicit `if-then-throw` code to validate parameters, you may be employing helper methods that perform checks and throw particular exceptions on failure, as shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractArgumentValidatorAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.diagnostics.contracts.contractargumentvalidatorattribute/cs/ifthenthrow1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractArgumentValidatorAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.diagnostics.contracts.contractargumentvalidatorattribute/vb/ifthenthrow1.vb#1)] 在此範例中，`Execute`具有選擇性的前置條件，指定參數值不得`null`。In this example, `Execute` has an elective precondition specifying that the parameter value should not be `null`. 若要啟用合約工具，可辨識運算式，這些呼叫`ValidationHelper.NotNull`合約表示，您可以將標記所呼叫的方法與屬性。To enable the contract tools to recognize that the call to `ValidationHelper.NotNull` represents a contract, you can mark the called method with the attribute. 方法呼叫應該用來啟用工具來擷取適當的規格文件的產生和靜態檢查，如下所示。The method call should be used to enable the tools to extract the proper specifications for document generation and static checking, as follows. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractArgumentValidatorAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.diagnostics.contracts.contractargumentvalidatorattribute/cs/ifthenthrow2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractArgumentValidatorAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.diagnostics.contracts.contractargumentvalidatorattribute/vb/ifthenthrow2.vb#2)] 除了`if-then-throw`陳述式中，合約驗證方法的合約區段可能包含其他合約的驗證方法的呼叫。In addition to `if-then-throw` statements, the contract section of contract validator methods may contain calls to other contract validator methods. 不過，任何其他合約 (例如，或) 允許。However, no other contracts (such as , or ) are allowed. 下列程式碼所有合約工具會都忽略呼叫。Code that follows the call is ignored by all contract tools. 下列範例顯示範圍引數的驗證程式，撰寫以現有`NotNull`驗證方法。The following example shows a range argument validator written in terms of an existing `NotNull` validator method. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractArgumentValidatorAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.diagnostics.contracts.contractargumentvalidatorattribute/cs/ifthenthrow3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractArgumentValidatorAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.diagnostics.contracts.contractargumentvalidatorattribute/vb/ifthenthrow3.vb#3)] 從規格的觀點，`Execute`方法具有下列三個合約：From a specification point of view, the `Execute` method has the following three contracts: ``` Contract.Requires(data != null); Contract.Requires(position >= 0); Contract.Requires(position < data.Length); ``` 在標準的方法中，合約驗證方法的呼叫可以自由地混合搭配其他合約這類或。In standard methods, calls to contract validator methods can be freely mixed with other contracts such as or .
